transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello. Ji sir.

Customer: Sir yaha pe jo side mein aap GST dikha likha rehta hai na yaha pe. To agar usme agar chhoti quantity ki lead bhi aaye na to us pe aap add kar dijiye.

Customer: Ab ab niche iska jaise ye aluminium corrugated sheet hai 1500. Ye dekha hua hai na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur iske niche wali blocking sheet hai ye wali hai.
Customer: Ye 1800 square feet iska bhi nahi hoga. Ha is time isko aap kar dijiye.

Customer: Ya iski aap wo videos bhi bana sakte hai chhoti chhoti si videos upload kar do product mein.
Customer: Video ha sir bana sakte hai hum sir agar hamare paas jaise YouTube ya to Facebook mein kuch hai hamare paas pehle.
Customer: YouTube aur Facebook hamare paas kuch wo hai kuch matlab profile vagera.
Executive: Nahi profile to maine aapko jaise ye bheji hui hai ye thoda sa khud wo karna padega.
Customer: Isse bhi ye hota hai kya YouTube ya to Facebook ya Instagram ki link jo hoti hai na hum yaha pe isko paste kar sakte hai. To usse ye hota hai ki link paste karne ke baad jaise hi wo waha pe click karega na to click karne ke baad turant wo YouTube mein land karega jaake aapki website pe. Aur zahir si baat hai sir mostly sabke paas YouTube to available rehta hi hai. Aur jaise hi waha pe land karega na jaake to sir hamara jo waha pe views bhi badhega YouTube ka aur uske sath sath might be subscription bhi badhenge. Aur yaha pe sir hamari video bhi dikh jayegi.
Customer: Main main aapko dikhata hu sir jo aapke product line pe jo present time pe hai na.
Customer: Ye hamara hard core selling product kaun sa hai.

Customer: Main apni aapko screen share karta hu.

Customer: Aur jaise aluminium roof sheeting hai.
Customer: Ab dekhiye yaha pe log pata hai sir leading supplier leke baithe hai.
Customer: Aur sabka achha business chal raha hai aise nahi ki kisi ka business nahi chal raha hai ab ye koi sir kisi mein se kisi ko jante hai aapko Manmohan. Ye hum deal nahi karte hai college mein.
Customer: Ye side mein jo hai ispe to hum karte hai na sir ye.
Customer: Type karke search karo. Niche drop down mein nahi aayega type karke search karna.
Customer: Ye ispe to deal karte hai sir hum. Inhone sirf TrustSeal leke ispe bhi TrustSeal leke chala rakha hai.
Customer: Ab ye Panache industries jo hai sirf TrustSeal hi liya hai. Matlab koi bada plan leading supplier vagera leading supplier vagera nahi liya inhone.
Customer: Ab dekhiye inke paas jo monthly ki agar call ka hum dekhe na ye monthly ki call ye aa rahi hai. Inquiries ka ye hai buylead ye use kar rahe hai. Ha ab reason ye hai ki sir ab ye log pata hai ab jaise hi koi search karta hai na hamara product to mostly upar unko TrustSeal wale hi dikh jate hai. Aur itne sare log TrustSeal wale hai ki hamare hamari bari na sir us pe aati nahi hamari jo profile hogi wo chauthe panchve page pe hogi aap khud hi jante hai sir jo jyada invest karega usko koi bhi platform ho wo pehle show karta hai. Aur sir itna bhi jyada invest nahi kar rakha hai in logo ne bahut jyada invest kar rakha ho. Hama humne sir 37 33000 mein onboard hue the aur ye log sir 45000 plus GST mein onboard hue the matlab 53. Matlab humse 20 se 25000 20 se 30000 jaake 20000 dekar ye sir ye log TrustSeal leke baithe hai. Aur sir agar hum manufacturer hai to zahir si baat hai at least hum TrustSeal se to onboard karte hi na.
Customer: Ab jo bada yaha pe sir supplier hoga to zahir si baat hai sir wo TrustSeal walon se connect karega. Bade businessman se connect karega hum bhale hi bade businessman hai lekin sir offline mein online mein to hamari kahi visibility hai nahi na ki hum manufacturer hai. Aur sir zahir si baat agar aap dekhenge na inki kabhi profile open karenge na to ye sir wholesaler hi honge manufacturer nahi honge.
Customer: Ye wholesaler honge ye aapse kharid kar ye aage jaake itne mein bech rahe honge. Aur sir aap jab onboard hue the na tabhi maine aapko aapki profile dikhai thi maine kaha sir yaha pe aap dekhiye itne sare log hai jo TrustSeal vagera pe yaha pe hai aur hum jo hai yaha pe sir manufacturer ho ji sir.
Executive: Nahi becha tha aapne ye bol rahe the ye cheez hai usme koi nahi.
Customer: Ye cheeze sir ji.
Executive: Pehle to isko optimize karo profile ko. Theek hai kya kya cheeze kar sakte hai pehle ek bar isme dekhiye.
Customer: Sir un jo seller hai na unke jo seller hai unko sir samajh sakta hu kyuki sir wo basic iski wajah se aapko suggest karte hai starting mein sir aap agar starting mein IndiaMART mein aaye aap sir bada plan le liya lekin aapko use karna nahi aata. To sir mushkil se do se teen mahina use karne mein matlab sikhne mein to chala hi jata hai. Ki kaise kya services use karte hai jaise buylead kaise kaise buylead connect karte hai ha kaise hum yaha pe filter laga sakte hai ye sari cheeze sir do se teen mahino mein samajh mein aati hai hume to uske baad fir aap TrustSeal lenge to aapka chhote aise amount mein jo hai aapka wo seekh jayenge aur uske baad TrustSeal lenge to waha se sir jo aapka paisa invest karenge waha pe pura ka pura utilize hoga.

Customer: Baki mujhe sir dekhiye present time pe jo aapke yaha pe wholesaler hai main unki profile hi dikha raha hu.
Customer: Yaha pe sir main aapko batau kya kya cheeze matlab optimize kar sakte hai sir hum dekhte hai.
Customer: Sir isme pata hai kya kya cheeze kar sakte hai ek to ye jo maine aap bana sakte ho khud bana sakte ho team se. Product category to di hui hai videos khud bana sakte ho short se clips bana lo.
Customer: Videos.
Executive: Hmm. Iske andar video add karwao sir apna yehi cheez lekin.
Customer: Sir iska ek kaam karta hu mere paas senior hai. Hmm video call pe le. Ha unse wo jyada behtar aapko suggest kar sakte hai is cheez ke regarding.
Executive: Nahi wo to chalo aap apne aap kar lena because meri aur meeting lined up hai. Aap isme thoda sa aap isko optimize karo profile ko apne end se wo main aapko keh raha hu. Pehle aap isko theek karo fir dekhte hai aage kya kar sakte hai. Pehle isko theek karo because ye aur sabne ye cheeze dali hui hai. Ye video bhi aap khud banwao chhote chhote clips.
Customer: Ye chhote chhote clips banwao yaar team to hogi aapke paas.
Customer: Sir clips to aap bana ke bhejenge na to hum upload kar sakte hai. Samajh mein nahi aa raha hai. Ye hamare samne product bhi to nahi hai sir.

Customer: Matlab aap kya wo jo image chalti hai unki baat kar rahe hai kya clip ki.
Customer: Chalo koi baat nahi apne end se karte hai aapko sochte hai fir dekhte hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir aap agar video mein ho to ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add small quantity leads.

- TrustSeal members appear first in search results.

- Wants to connect with big businessman.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested optimizing the profile.

- Executive suggested adding videos.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will optimize the profile.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, profile, videos, buyleads
